synonyms.synonym: Protein phosphatase with EF calcium-binding domain

protein.specific_function: May have a role in the recovery or adaptation response of photoreceptors. May have a role in development.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds
detection of stimulus involved in sensory perception
detection of stimulus involved in sensory perception

reference.reference_text: Sherman PM, Sun H, Macke JP, Williams J, Smallwood PM, Nathans J: Identification and characterization of a conserved family of protein serine/threonine phosphatases homologous to Drosophila retinal degeneration C. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1997 Oct 14;94(21):11639-44.
